extensionName: Streaming enhanced: Netflix Disney+ Prime Video
extensionDescription: Skip ads, intros, credits and add adjust speed, etc. on Netflix, Prime video, Disney+, Crunchyroll and HBO max.
sharedSettingsDescription: These options will only enable/disable the {0} part of the shared setting
defaultPageDescription: Every feature which is turned off by default either because they are confusing if they were turned on or they are in beta
DefaultPaidContentDescription: Removing every paid movie/series category from Amazon prime
SharedPageDescription: These options will only enable/disable the settings for all streaming services. In the below table you can disable the shared settings for a specific service
SharedIntroDescription: Skipping the intros and recaps of any series. Except Netflix since there Recaps cannot be watched again.
CreditsSwitchDescription: Skipping to the next episode of every series as fast as possible
AdsSwitchDescription: Skipping freevee ads for amazon and all of the ads in the basic Netflix tier
FullscreenSwitchDescription: If a video is put on fullscreen, the video will play automatically
SelfAdsSwitchDescription: Skipping the prime show previews which are shown before any video
ContinuePositionDescription: Move category "Continue" to the top of the page
InactivitySwitchDescription: Resumes the video if the 'Are you still watching' prompt is shown
ProfileSwitchDescription: The last used profile is directly chosen when the page is launched
AmazonAdDescription: Time of skipped FreeVee Ads + Prime Video Self Ads
StatisticIntroDescription: Time of skipped Intros on Netflix, Amazon and Disney+
StatisticRecapDescription: Time of skipped Recaps on Netflix, Amazon and Disney+
StatisticSegmentsDescription: Amount of Individual Segments Skipped like an Intro or an Ad for Netflix, Amazon and Disney+
WatchCreditsSwitchDescription: Always watch the credits of every series
RatingSwitchDescription: Adding the TMDB rating to every movie and series
ReleaseCalendarDescription: Adds the checkboxes 'Show Playlists only' and 'Filter DUB' to the release calendar
EpilepsySwitchDescription: Darken the screen when skipping the ad
UserAgentSwitchDescription: For prime video and disney+ change to the Desktop website and for amazon make the site mobile friendly
XraySwitchDescription: Hide the Xray Quick View over a video
autoOpenDescription: If on streaming site open the according settings in popup automatically
DuplicateSwitchDescription: Remove every duplicate show, which was already visible on Disney before. Visible means that the show is in the first 5 shows in every row
BigPlayerDescription: Extends the video size to the entire browser window without full screen.
DisableNumpadDescription: Disable the numpad keys so you don't accidentally change the current video time/position.
DoubleClickSwitchDescription: If you double click on the video it will go to fullscreen.
scrollVolumeDescription: Scrolling up or down on the Sound Icon will change the volume.
ShowYearDescription: Shows the release year next to the rating.
